Comments: newest deposits rapidly rounding out - good bonding to underlying old refrozen snowpack

Comments: Some drifting above 850m. Rise in temp late morning and rain. Cornice collapsed observed across in Coire Chriochairein at 1230hrs.

Comments: Observations difficult in blustery conditions. New snow rounding quickly between showers.

A little summit snow. Thawing old snow in all other locations. Isothermal snowpack.

Generally stable spring snowpack.

Comments: Light snowfall from late morning. Localised new accumulations at time of reporting. Easier shears during warming trend.
